item.title: 中国指责美国入侵国家授时中心网络
item.description: 中国指责美国窃取机密并渗透了中国的国家授时中心，警告说严重的漏洞可能会破坏通信网络、金融系统、电力供应和国际标准时间。【原文：China has accused the U.S. of stealing secrets and infiltrating the country's national time centre, warning that serious breaches could have disrupted communication networks, financial systems, the power supply and the international standard time.】

item.title: 英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋将出席在韩国举行的亚太经合组织首席执行官峰会
item.description: 英伟达™（NVIDIA®）首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）周日在一份声明中说，他计划在本月出席在韩国举行的亚太经济合作组织首席执行官峰会时会见 "全球领导人和韩国高层管理人员"。【原文：NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang plans to meet "global leaders and top Korean executives" when he attends the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation CEO Summit in South Korea this month, the U.S. AI chipmaker said in a statement on Sunday.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：中国政府介入后，中国科技巨头暂停稳定币计划
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周六报道，在政府对私人部门控制的货币兴起表示担忧后，包括阿里巴巴支持的蚂蚁金服集团和电子商务集团京东商城在内的中国科技巨头暂停了在香港发行稳定币的计划。【原文：Chinese tech giants including Alibaba-backed Ant Group and e-commerce group JD.com have paused plans to issue stablecoins in Hong Kong after the government raised concerns about the rise of currencies controlled by the private sector, the Financial Times reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 艾睿电子称美国对其中国子公司的贸易限制正在逆转
item.description: 总部位于美国的电子元件分销商艾睿电子（Arrow Electronics）周六表示，美国政府正在撤销对艾睿电子在中国的关联公司实施的贸易限制，因为这些公司为胡塞武装（Houthis）等伊朗支持的组织所使用的武器化无人机中发现的美国元件的销售提供了便利。【原文：U.S.-based electronic components distributor Arrow Electronics said on Saturday the U.S. government was reversing trade restrictions placed on Arrow's China-based affiliates for facilitating the sale of U.S. components found in weaponized drones used by Iran-backed groups like the Houthis.】

item.title: 苹果公司与 F1 转播商的合作已酝酿多年
item.description: 当伯尼-埃克尔斯通（Bernie Ecclestone）被问及九年前一群客人在一级方程式比赛中享受贵宾待遇时，这位商业巨头说他们是 "一家水果公司 "的代表。【原文：When Bernie Ecclestone was asked about a group of guests receiving VIP treatment at a Formula One race nine years ago, the commercial supremo said they were representatives of "a fruit company".】

item.title: 美国法院命令间谍软件公司 NSO 停止针对 WhatsApp 的间谍活动，并降低了赔偿金额
item.description: 美国法院已下令以色列 NSO 集团停止针对 Meta Platforms 公司的 WhatsApp 消息服务，这家间谍软件公司警告说，这一事态发展可能会使其破产。【原文：A U.S. court has ordered Israel's NSO Group to stop targeting Meta Platforms' WhatsApp messaging service, a development the spyware company warned could put it out of business.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，Kering 接近以 40 亿美元将美容部门出售给欧莱雅
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周六援引知情人士的话报道，法国奢侈品集团开云集团（Kering）正就以约 40 亿美元的价格将其美容部门出售给美容集团欧莱雅（L'Oreal）一事进行深入谈判。【原文：French luxury group Kering is in advanced talks to sell its beauty division to beauty group L’Oreal for about $4 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported on Saturday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据 Variety 报道，派拉蒙 Skydance 将于 10 月 27 日开始的一周内在美国裁员 2000 人
item.description: 据 Variety 周六援引公司消息来源报道，派拉蒙天舞公司将于 10 月 27 日开始大规模裁员，裁掉约 2000 个美国工作岗位，作为新任首席执行官大卫-埃里森（David Ellison）20 亿美元成本削减计划的一部分。【原文：Paramount Skydance will begin mass layoffs the week of October 27, eliminating around 2,000 U.S. jobs as part of a $2 billion cost-cutting plan under new CEO David Ellison, Variety reported on Saturday, citing company sources.】

item.title: 与荷兰关系紧张，Nexperia 中国部门坚持独立自主
item.description: Nexperia 中国公司周六表示，该公司一直遵守中国法律，并有权独立运营，此前一天，荷兰表示已开始会谈，试图缓解出口管制方面的紧张关系。【原文：Nexperia’s China unit has respected Chinese laws and has the right to operate independently, it said on Saturday, a day after the Netherlands said talks had begun to try to ease tensions over export controls.】

item.title: 全球电影业摆脱特朗普再次发出的电影关税威胁
item.description: "尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）再次威胁要对美国境外制作的电影征收关税，但全球电影业仍在继续发展。【原文："Star Wars: Starfighter" is filming in Britain, soundstages in Hungary are packed and post-production houses in Australia are humming, as the global film industry keeps rolling despite U.S. President Donald Trump's renewed threats to impose tariffs on movies made outside of the United States.】

item.title: 三星电子家族在股价上涨之际出售 12 亿美元股份
item.description: 三星电子在一份监管文件中表示，三星电子董事长李在镕的母亲和两个姐妹计划出售这家韩国科技公司价值约 1.73 万亿韩元（约合 12.2 亿美元）的股份。【原文：The mother and two sisters of Samsung Electronics Chairman Jay Y. Lee plan to sell some 1.73 trillion won ($1.22 billion) worth of shares in the South Korean tech firm, the company said in a regulatory filing.】

item.title: 鲁比奥与利比里亚部长讨论促进美国参与利比里亚关键矿产部门的问题
item.description: 美国国务院周五表示，美国国务卿马尔科-鲁比奥（Marco Rubio）在本周与利比里亚外交部长萨拉-贝索洛-尼安蒂（Sara Beysolow Nyanti）的会晤中讨论了美国扩大参与利比里亚关键矿产部门的途径。【原文：U.S. Secretary of State Marco Rubio discussed avenues for expanding U.S. participation in Liberia's critical minerals sector in a meeting this week with Liberian Foreign Minister Sara Beysolow Nyanti, the State Department said on Friday.】

item.title: 消息称电动汽车供应链数据公司 Benchmark Mineral 裁员
item.description: Benchmark Mineral Intelligence 是一家总部位于英国的能源转型矿物定价和数据研究公司，该公司的三位熟知内情的人士表示，最近几周该公司至少裁减了五分之一的员工。【原文：Benchmark Mineral Intelligence, a UK-based pricing and data research firm for energy transition minerals, has cut at least a fifth of its workforce in recent weeks, said three people familiar with the company.】

item.title: 特朗普批准减免美国汽车生产关税，发布新的卡车关税政策
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周五签署命令，批准大幅减免美国汽车和发动机生产的关税，并从11月1日起对进口中型和重型卡车及零部件征收25%的新关税。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Friday signed orders approving significant tariff relief for U.S. auto and engine production and setting new 25% tariffs on imported medium- and heavy-duty trucks and parts starting November 1.】

item.title: 阿波罗支持的墨西哥航空公司在美国首次公开募股中寻求最高 29 亿美元的估值
item.description: 墨西哥航空公司集团（Grupo Aeroméxico）周五表示，其美国首次公开募股的目标估值高达 29.2 亿美元，这家墨西哥航空公司希望在两年多后再次上市。【原文：Grupo Aeroméxico said on Friday it was targeting a valuation of up to $2.92 billion in its U.S. initial public offering, as the Mexican carrier looks to go public again after over two years.】

item.title: 小特朗普和奥米德-马利克支持的 SPAC 申请 2.6 亿美元的美国 IPO
item.description: 奥米德-马利克（Omeed Malik）支持的空白支票公司 Colombier Acquisition Corp.奥米德-马利克（Omeed Malik）支持的空头支票公司哥伦比亚收购公司三期（Colombier Acquisition Corp. III）周五在美国提交了首次公开募股申请。【原文：Colombier Acquisition Corp. III, a blank-check firm backed by Omeed Malik, filed for an initial public offering in the United States on Friday.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局称波音公司可将 737 MAX 的月产量提高到 42 架
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）和波音公司周五表示，该局取消了自2024年1月起实施的每月生产38架飞机的上限，波音公司可以将737 MAX的月产量提高到42架。【原文：Boeing can hike 737 MAX production to 42 planes per month after the Federal Aviation Administration lifted a 38 plane-per-month cap that had been in place since January 2024, the agency and planemaker said on Friday.】

item.title: 据 Axios 报道，Nvidia 和台积电推出首款美国制造的 Blackwell 芯片晶圆
item.description: 据Axios报道，英伟达（Nvidia）和台积电（TSMC）将于本周五宣布其首个完成的美国制造晶圆，这些晶圆最终将成为用于人工智能的Blackwell芯片。【原文：Nvidia and TSMC will announce on Friday their first completed U.S.-made wafer that will eventually become Blackwell chips for AI purposes, Axios reported.】

item.title: 加利福尼亚州对声称可回收利用的塑料袋制造商采取行动
item.description: 加利福尼亚州周五宣布对三家主要塑料袋生产商提起诉讼，并与另外四家生产商达成和解，在此之前，加利福尼亚州已经完成了对这些生产商谎称塑料袋可回收的调查。【原文：The state of California announced a lawsuit against three major plastic bag producers and reached a settlement with four other manufacturers on Friday after concluding an investigation into their false claims that these bags were recyclable.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，KKR 支持的 FiberCop 就意大利援助竞争对手的指控向欧盟提出申诉
item.description: 三位知情人士透露，KKR 支持的电信网络公司 FiberCop 已向欧盟委员会提出申诉，指控意大利违反欧盟竞争规则，向竞争对手 Open Fiber 提供国家援助。【原文：KKR-backed telecom network firm FiberCop has filed a complaint with the European Commission, alleging that Italy provided state aid to rival Open Fiber in breach of EU competition rules, three sources with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 中美港口收费扰乱货流，推高费率
item.description: 业内高管表示，中国和美国对靠港征收的新费用正在减少可用于运输货物的货轮数量，并有可能增加两国的消费成本。【原文：New fees imposed on port calls by China and the U.S. are reducing the number of cargo vessels available for moving goods and threatening to increase consumer costs in both countries, industry executives said.】

item.title: 波音公司罢工工会将于周一恢复合同谈判
item.description: 代表 3,200 多名波音公司罢工工人的工会周五表示，已同意下周恢复与美国飞机制造商的合同讨论。【原文：A union representing more than 3,200 striking Boeing workers said on Friday it had agreed to resume contract discussions with the U.S. planemaker next week.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织总裁希望中美稀土交易避免对全球经济造成 "实质性影响
item.description: 国际货币基金组织总裁克里斯塔琳娜-格奥尔基耶娃（Kristalina Georgieva）周五表示，她希望美国和中国能达成协议，避免全球经济中的稀土供应断流，并补充说这种限制将对经济增长产生 "实质性影响"。【原文：International Monetary Fund Managing Director Kristalina Georgieva said on Friday she was hoping for an agreement between the U.S. and China that avoids a cutoff in the flow of rare earths to the global economy, adding that such restrictions would have a "material impact" on growth.】

item.title: 美联储穆萨莱姆倾向于支持 10 月降息
item.description: 圣路易斯联邦储备银行行长阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆周五表示，他将支持央行在本月底降息，同时警告说，在通胀风险仍不稳定的情况下，美联储在放宽信贷成本方面不能走得太远。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis President Alberto Musalem suggested Friday he will support a central bank interest rate cut at the end of the month, while warning it's important for the Fed not to go too far with easing the cost of credit amid still unsettled inflation risks.】

item.title: 特斯拉薪酬计划面临反弹，ISS敦促投票反对马斯克的 1 万亿美元方案
item.description: 周五，代理咨询公司机构股东服务公司（Institutional Shareholder Services）敦促特斯拉股东投票反对首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）提议的 1 万亿美元业绩奖励，理由是担心薪酬过高和治理风险。【原文：Proxy advisory firm Institutional Shareholder Services on Friday urged Tesla shareholders to vote against CEO Elon Musk's proposed $1 trillion performance award, citing concerns over excessive compensation and governance risks.】

item.title: 瑞士部长在美国与贝森特会谈，未透露关税问题取得进展的迹象
item.description: 瑞士经济部长居伊-帕梅林（Guy Parmelin）周五表示，他已就美国对瑞士征收39%的关税一事与美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）进行了简短的交谈，但他没有表示在减少征税方面取得了进展。【原文：Swiss Economy Minister Guy Parmelin said on Friday he had spoken briefly to U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent about the United States' 39% tariffs on Switzerland, but he gave no indication of progress on reducing the levies.】

item.title: 与甲骨文有关的黑客攻击活动针对特使航空公司
item.description: 美国航空公司最大的地区性航空公司 Envoy Air 周五证实，该公司最近几天遭到黑客攻击，这是黑客利用甲骨文电子商务套件应用程序进行勒索的一部分。【原文：Envoy Air, American Airlines' largest regional carrier, suffered a hack in recent days as part of the wave of extortion attempts from hackers exploiting Oracle E-Business Suite applications, the company confirmed on Friday.】

item.title: 保时捷期待 SUV 老板莱特斯回归，接过 "毒杯
item.description: 保时捷邀请前迈凯轮老板迈克尔-莱特斯（Michael Leiters）重振这家德国豪华汽车制造商的举动受到了投资者的欢迎，尽管他们对新老板面临的挑战并不抱幻想。【原文：Porsche's moves to bring in ex-McLaren boss Michael Leiters to revive the luxury German carmaker were welcomed by investors, although they have no illusions about the challenge in store for the new boss.】

item.title: 备忘录显示，高盛对新成立的资本解决方案集团管理层进行了调整
item.description: 据路透社周五看到的一份内部备忘录称，高盛已对其负责大型交易融资和为企业客户提供贷款的部门进行了多项组织调整和任命。【原文：Goldman Sachs has made several organizational changes and appointments in its unit that focuses on financing large deals and providing loans to corporate clients, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters on Friday.】

item.title: A2A 首席执行官称，米兰数据中心的容量将在五年内激增十倍
item.description: 能源集团 A2A 首席执行官周五表示，意大利金融之都米兰周边的数据中心预计将在未来五年内增加约两千兆瓦的发电能力，比目前的水平增加十倍。【原文：Data centres around Italy's financial capital Milan are expected to add around two gigawatts of capacity over the next five years, a tenfold increase from current levels, the Chief Executive of energy group A2A said on Friday.】
